fields.headline: Vloggies results
fields.bodyText: Robert Scoble has reported on the Vloggies awards for video bloggers, with links to various sites. These include a video report from triple award-winner Rox, of Beach Walks. Separately, Scoble has lists of the judge's awards and the people's choice awards. Ze Frank and Rocketboom were among the not surprising winners, but Ask A Ninja was the people's favourite vlog. Josh Wolf sent his acceptance speech from jail, where he ended up for refusing to hand over unpublished videotapes to a Grand Jury.
